mapper.select: SELECT * from space WHERE space_type_name = "标准座位"

select space_id as spaceId,schedule_slot.begin_time as beginTime,duration from schedule_slot inner join schedule on schedule_slot.schedule_id = schedule.id inner join space on `schedule`.space_id = space.id where space.space_type_name = "标准研习间" AND schedule.date = #{0} ORDER BY space_id,schedule_slot.begin_time
